text.p: Does [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] respect vector addition? That is, is [mathjaxinline]T(\vecv + \vecw ) = T(\vecv ) + T(\vecw )[/mathjaxinline] for all vectors [mathjaxinline]\vecv ,\vecw[/mathjaxinline]? Try a couple of specific numerical examples if you're not sure.

Does [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] respect scalar multiplication? That is, is [mathjaxinline]T(a\vecv ) = aT(\vecv )[/mathjaxinline] for all vectors [mathjaxinline]\vecv[/mathjaxinline] and scalars [mathjaxinline]a[/mathjaxinline]? Try a couple of specific numerical examples if you're not sure.
